Foundation is a communications firm building great beauty brands. We are known for launching and scaling the industry’s most recognizable brands, disrupting categories and transforming culture in the process.

Associate Vice President (AVP), Public Relations
Location: NYC or LA
Reports to: Co-Founders + Managing Director

Job Summary
The Associate Vice President (VP) of Public Relations at Foundation is a senior strategic leader responsible for guiding PR teams, managing high-profile beauty clients, and driving business expansion. The AVP ensures that all PR strategies align with industry trends, client objectives, and Foundation’s brand vision.

Key Responsibilities
● Client Strategy & Leadership
○ Perform as the primary strategic lead for assigned clients, ensuring PR campaigns align with business goals and market positioning.
○ Oversee the execution of integrated PR, influencer, and digital strategies.
○ Provide senior-level strategic counsel to clients on brand positioning and reputation management.
○ Set result-driven media and influencer strategies in alignment with client objectives; identify and resolve issues when strategies aren’t working or the situations change.
○ Increase editorial coverage qualitatively as well as quantitatively to support the market.
○ Manage the budgets and recommend spending priorities which maximize the return on investment.

● Media & Influencer Relations
○ Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with top-tier media, influencers, and VIPs in the beauty sectors.
○ Oversee the development and execution of proactive media and influencer outreach strategies.
○ Secure high-impact media placements across print, digital, and social platforms.

● Team Management & Development
○ Lead and mentor 7-9 account teams, ensuring a culture of strategic excellence, creativity, and high performance.
○ Provide coaching and professional development opportunities to junior team members.
○ Play a leadership role on a team of 15+ people including cross-functional internal teams within the influencer, talent, and affiliate space
○ Responsible for the wellbeing, workload, performance, and profitability of the team, ensuring the ongoing needs of all Beauty clients are being met.
○ Liaise with NYC/LA offices to work across shared accounts

● Business Growth & Innovation
○ Identify opportunities for account growth and support business development initiatives.
○ Sell in additional services in addition PR services when pitching new business or counseling existing clients
○ Contribute to thought leadership and industry positioning to enhance Foundation’s reputation.
○ Ability to bring in $400-500K in annual client revenue (new + existing with expanded services)
○ Ability to retain 80-85% of your annual client list

Qualifications
● 10+ years of public relations experience in beauty brands.
● Proven ability to execute high-impact PR campaigns and secure top-tier media placements.
● Strong leadership skills, with experience in client management and team development.
● Exceptional strategic thinking, communication, and problem-solving abilities.

Compensation: $130k - $160k depending on experience and qualifications.

To Apply: Please email melissa@wearefoundation.co
